title: 80x2: Specific Parties under 18 U.S.C. § 207(a) and (b)(i)
summary: Unless the potential offeror was identified as a party or one of a number of potential parties to the particular matter in question at the time two former employees worked on the matter, the bar in 18 U.S.C. § 207(a) and 207(b)(i) would not attach.
